about_the_game:
Enjoy the complete World War II Online action experience with a Premium Subscription.


Continue your career in all ground/air/navy branches and increase your rank along the way as you battle for the Allies or the Axis!

By being a Premium Subscriber you gain access to a larger variety of privileges, including the following:
  • Access to all Infantry weapons (except special units available through DLCs), paratroopers, tanks, trucks, artillery guns, in the Army persona
  • Access to all fighters, bombers, ground vehicles and support troops in the Air Force persona
  • Access to Destroyers, transports, riverine boats and marine forces in the Naval persona
  • Ability to earn higher player rank (Private to Lt. Colonel) in all personas

As the war progresses from 1940 to 1945, your side will introduce newer equipment to the battle. As these more advanced items come to the front, the premium subscription will give you the opportunity to access more than 200 authentic WWII weapons and vehicles.

British army

Troops
  • Rifleman: Enfield No 4 Mk I
  • Grenadier: Enfield No 4 Mk I
  • Mortarman: SBML 2 Inch + Enfield No 4 Mk I
  • Sniper: Enfield No 4 Mk I (T)
  • Engineer: Enfield No 4 Mk I
  • SMG: M1928 Thompson
  • LMG: BREN Mk II
  • AT: Boys Anti-Tank Rifle
  • AT: PIAT

Paratroopers
  • (Para) Rifleman: Enfield No 4 Mk I
  • (Para) SMG: M1928 Thompson
  • (Para) Sniper: Enfield No 4 Mk I
  • (Para) Mortarman: SBML 2 Inch + Enfield No 4 Mk I
  • (Para) LMG: BREN Mk II

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Sierra 10.12.2+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better

name: WWII Online - Premium Pass

package_groups.description: To be billed on a recurring basis.
package_groups.name: subscriptions

subs.option_description: $17.99 USD at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at $17.99 USD.

package_groups.title: Buy WWII Online - Premium Pass Subscription Plan

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3.2 GHz or Athlon 64 3500+ (2.2 GHz) or better with SSE 2.0 support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 / Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual Core or 2.66 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better

price_overview.recurring_sub_desc: $17.99 USD at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at $17.99 USD.

reviews:
“The battles that follow aren’t typical of most first-person action games.”
Warfare History Network

“an incredibly fun and long lasting game for any war gamer or history buff. ... you’ll still be playing this months, or even years, from now.”
8.4/10 – Game Chronicles

“it’s remarkably compulsive. The concept and the individual challenges are unique, and the sheer difficulty of it makes riding a tank for 20 miles peculiarly rewarding. ... there’s nothing else quite like it.”
4/5 – Games Radar
short_description: As a premium user, you will gain access to all that WWII Online has to offer: all Infantry, Paratroopers, Tanks, Air Planes, Trucks, Guns, Boats, High Command, Squad creation - everything. Best offer on the battlefield - subscribe now!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
